online.common
Class StockArt

java.lang.Object
  online.common.StockArt
Direct Known Subclasses:
chip
public class StockArt
extends java.lang.Object

StockArt is a thin extension on Image, with support for loading, masking and displaying the images. A selection of useful images are loaded automatically, and your artwork can be loaded separately as stock art.

Most of the "chip" classes are subclasses of stockart.

Author:
ddyer

Field Detail

file

public java.lang.String file
the file from which this image was loaded

scale

public double[] scale
An array of 3 elements, x offset, y offset and scale factor.
These parameters are used to normalize the location and size of the image relative to its center. This array is normally set up during construction and not changed.

image

public java.awt.Image image
the underlying image for this StockArt

preLoadArt

public static StockArt[] preLoadArt(exCanvas forcan,
                                    java.lang.String ImageDir,
                                    java.lang.String[] ImageNames,
                                    boolean masks,
                                    double[][] scale)
Load StockArt for use with a game from jpeg images and masks

Parameters:
forcan - the canvas that will supervise the loading
ImageDir - the directory to load from
ImageNames - a list of image names
masks - an array of mask images
scale - an array of x,y,scale specs for the images
Returns:
an array of StockArt images

                                    double[][] scale)

ImageNames - an array of image names

Parameters:

canvas - the canvas to draw on

cy -
label - the string label, or null

draw an image (or it's alternate) and a text string to label it. The string is drawn centered according to the x,y offset
